reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is amazing! Her lectures are clear and she really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Great professor, but the exams are really tough. Pay attention in class!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, but she knows her stuff. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Not the best at explaining concepts, but the textbook covers everything.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Very passionate about biology. Her enthusiasm makes the subject interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but make sure to do the readings or you'll get lost.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had. She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Philosophy isn't for everyone, and his teaching style is very traditional.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid professor, but sometimes goes too fast during lectures. Ask questions!

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Very engaging and always encourages class discussions. You'll learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Insightful lectures and a fair grader. Just keep up with the readings.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her slides are informative, but she reads directly from them. Not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Brilliant professor. He challenges you, but you'll come out with a deep understanding.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Not a bad professor, but she grades essays pretty harshly. Be prepared to rewrite.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable and approachable. The class is a bit demanding, but worth it.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The material is difficult, and her explanations can be confusing. Attend every class.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures and very supportive during fieldwork. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: She makes linguistics accessible, even for beginners. Pay attention to the details.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Average professor, but the content is interesting. Class is mostly lecture-based.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: She has a deep passion for music and it shows. Very inspiring professor.
